Wondering when the next long weekend is?
Use this app to find the upcoming long weekends and start planning now. Find all upcoming and past holidays!

Read detailed information on all holidays and the badge on extension icon shows you the number of days ahead for the next long weekend!

Weekends for the following countries are included - Australia, Canada, UK, USA
